data.label: Realm
data.description: Realm 平台是一个用于跨平台应用程序的次世代数据层。Realm 是响应式的、并发的和轻量级的，它允许您使用实时的原生对象。使用 Realm 可使您的应用程序在信号较弱、脱机或中断的情况下无缝运行。

data.label: Realm
data.description: The Realm platform is a next-generation data layer for cross-platform applications. Realm is reactive, concurrent, and lightweight, allowing you to use live native objects. Using Realm enables your application to run seamlessly in weak signal, offline, or interrupted conditions.
